pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regression estimation based on the compound covariate method under the Cox proportional hazard model // Calculate regression coefficients and their standard deviations under the Cox proportional hazard model with the large number of covariates. A shrinkage type estimation based on the compound covariate method (Emura, Chen Chen, 2012 PLoS ONE) and a univariate gene selection method under dependent censoring (Emura Chen, 2014 Statistical Methods in Medical Research) are implemented in this package.
